messages.title: Remember to vote for my Labour Action Team
messages.content: On 6th May residents also have the chance to show the Tories who they really are by supporting your Labour Action Team of councillors...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lobbied for the funding for Epsom and St Helier hospitals to ensure that local residents have access to life-saving emergency and acute inpatient care right on their doorstep.
Since becoming MP, there have been nine more bobbies on the beat in Mitcham and Morden.
Worked successfully to get the Harris Academy to take over Tamworth Manor School, which has now become one of the fastest improving schools in the country.

issues.health: Being there for local people - thousands of my residents now receive the right diagnosis and appropriate treatment thanks to the expansions at St George's Hospital...

housing.content: Please support my local Labour Action Team on 6th May elections so that they continue to show the Tories who they really are...

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked for local people, helped with investment in schools and hospitals.

images.caption: Siobhain McDonagh at Harris Academy, supporting local education.
Siobhain McDonagh with Labour Action Team and local constituents, advocating for local issues.
